message_title.message: Google Chrome cannot display the web page

error_desc.message: An issue prevented Google Chrome from displaying the web page.  Click the button to the left to launch HP Network Check to automatically diagnose and repair the issue.

hpnc_desc_1.message: Can automatically detect, diagnose and repair many common network issues

hpnc_desc_2.message: Integrated with Windows Network Diagnostics Framework, so it runs both automatically providing comprehensive network diagnostics

hpnc_desc_3.message: Provides clear instructions to resolve issues that cannot be fixed automatically

hpnc_desc_4.message: Shows key system and network information for easier troubleshooting
